content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254152,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス兵はすでに何度か戦っているが勝てない事は分かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Lizas soldiers have fought several times already, but they know they cannot win."},{"lineNumber":254153,"originalJapaneseLine":"耐えて耐えて、ある程度時間を稼いだら撤収するか、次の部隊にチェンジする","translatedEnglishLine":"They endure and endure, and once they buy some time, they either retreat or switch to the next unit."},{"lineNumber":254154,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィに鉄の網をかぶせて時間稼ぎ、落とし穴とかの罠、とにかく時間稼ぎが主","translatedEnglishLine":"Covering Silky with an iron net to buy time, with traps like pits—anyway, the main goal is to stall for time."},{"lineNumber":254155,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス、コルドバの指揮の下、魔人を無闇に恐れずに有効に対処しています","translatedEnglishLine":"Under the command of Bares and Cordoba, they are effectively dealing with the demon without unreasonable fear."},{"lineNumber":254156,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィが強い感じは見せて下さい、勝てない暴走機関車、恐ろしい存在","translatedEnglishLine":"Show that the demon Silky feels strong—a runaway locomotive that cannot be defeated, a terrifying existence."},{"lineNumber":254157,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦線は後退し魔軍がどんどんリーザス城方面へ迫ってきた、地図で見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"The frontline has retreated and the demon army is steadily advancing toward Lizas Castle; show this on the map."},{"lineNumber":254158,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス、頃合いだな。砲兵部隊に連絡しろ、出番だと","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares, the time is right. Contact the artillery unit; it's their turn."},{"lineNumber":254159,"originalJapaneseLine":"後方、砲兵部隊、チューリップ２号マレスケと香澄。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rear, artillery unit: Tulip No. 2 Malesuke and Kasumi."},{"lineNumber":254160,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの指示を受けて砲撃開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Receiving Bares' orders, they begin shelling."},{"lineNumber":254161,"originalJapaneseLine":"再び前線","translatedEnglishLine":"Back to the frontline."},{"lineNumber":254162,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの戦略的な誘導により突出してきた魔軍、魔人シルキィが集中している","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army, pushed forward by Bares' strategic guidance, is concentrated around the demon Silky."},{"lineNumber":254163,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにピンポイントで砲撃が降り注いだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Pinpoint artillery fire rained down there."},{"lineNumber":254164,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍側の被害は甚大","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army suffered severe damage."},{"lineNumber":254165,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスを賞賛する部下達、やりましたね将軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Subordinates praise Bares: \"Well done, General.\""},{"lineNumber":254166,"originalJapaneseLine":"確かに大きな被害は与えたが、戦力差がありすぎ、一時しのぎに過ぎない","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed, we've inflicted major damage, but the difference in strength is too great; it’s just a temporary reprieve."},{"lineNumber":254167,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵が混乱しているからといって深追いしてはいけない、こちらも撤収するぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though the enemy is confused, we must not pursue recklessly; we will also withdraw."},{"lineNumber":254168,"originalJapaneseLine":"後、砲兵部隊は今夜中に陣地を撤収させろ、砲は放棄してよい","translatedEnglishLine":"Furthermore, the artillery unit must withdraw their positions by tonight. The cannons may be abandoned."},{"lineNumber":254169,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、あれはカスタムから借り受けた貴重な兵器ですよ、放棄なんて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"But those are valuable weapons borrowed from Custom. Abandoning them..."},{"lineNumber":254170,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵もあの威力は十分に知っただろう、明日の朝には攻めてくるぞ、いや下手したら","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy now fully knows their power. They'll attack by tomorrow morning, or worse,"},{"lineNumber":254171,"originalJapaneseLine":"今夜中にも来るかもしれない、あの砲台は簡単には動かせないし","translatedEnglishLine":"They might come even tonight. That cannon emplacement can’t be moved easily."},{"lineNumber":254172,"originalJapaneseLine":"接近戦になると守りきれないからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"If it becomes close combat, we won’t be able to defend it."},{"lineNumber":254173,"originalJapaneseLine":"砲は失ってもカスタムから借り受けている砲兵のみなさんは待避させねばならない","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if we lose the cannons, the artillery soldiers borrowed from Custom must be evacuated."},{"lineNumber":254174,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じの話・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s the kind of conversation it was..."},{"lineNumber":254175,"originalJapaneseLine":"冷静な判断をしている雰囲気で","translatedEnglishLine":"With an atmosphere of calm judgment."},{"lineNumber":254176,"originalJapaneseLine":"第１軍の陣地にランスが到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance arrived at the 1st army's position."},{"lineNumber":254177,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスが出迎えてくれる、バレスとランスのそれっぽい会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares welcomed him; Bares and Lance have a fitting conversation."},{"lineNumber":254178,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達を護衛してきたハウレーン、バレスとぎこちない会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Howleen, who has been escorting Lance and his group, has an awkward conversation with Bares."},{"lineNumber":254179,"originalJapaneseLine":"親に逆らって騎士になった娘、嫁にも行き遅れた、まったく（だが少し誇らしい）","translatedEnglishLine":"A daughter who defied her parents to become a knight, and has become late for marriage—really (but somewhat proud)."},{"lineNumber":254180,"originalJapaneseLine":"嫁入り前に傷ものになってはどうする、いや、任務だから自ら傷付こうとランス達を守れ","translatedEnglishLine":"What if she gets damaged before marriage? No, since it’s a mission, she’ll willingly get hurt to protect Lance and the others."},{"lineNumber":254181,"originalJapaneseLine":"とかいいつつ、ランス殿よろしく頼みますと親ばかっぷりも出すとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying things like that, yet showing a doting parent’s side by asking ‘Please take care of Lance, sir.’"},{"lineNumber":254182,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウレーンはランスに犯された事を父には当然言えない","translatedEnglishLine":"Howleen, of course, cannot tell her father that Lance violated her."},{"lineNumber":254183,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍、その夜","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army, that night."},{"lineNumber":254184,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦い疲れて戻って来たシルキィ、チューリップの砲撃直撃も受けた","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky, exhausted from battle, returned—she was also hit directly by Tulip's shelling."},{"lineNumber":254185,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ヨシフもいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster General Yosif is also present."},{"lineNumber":254186,"originalJapaneseLine":"（シルキィは最初は鎧、そして鎧解除する）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Silky initially wears armor, then removes it.)"},{"lineNumber":254187,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネチネチとシルキィを言葉で嬲ります。","translatedEnglishLine":"They verbally torment Silky in a nagging manner."},{"lineNumber":254188,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間に手加減をしたな、勝てなかったばかりか魔軍に多数の被害が出た","translatedEnglishLine":"You showed mercy to the humans, didn’t you? Not only did you fail to win, but you also caused many losses to the demon army."},{"lineNumber":254189,"originalJapaneseLine":"貴様が殺したのも同じだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the same as what you killed."},{"lineNumber":254190,"originalJapaneseLine":"元人間の英雄だったから、我々ではなく人間の味方を優先したのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Because you were once a human hero, you prioritized humans over us?"},{"lineNumber":254191,"originalJapaneseLine":"裏切り者か、それなら・・ケイブリス様に報告しないといけないな","translatedEnglishLine":"A traitor, then... If so, we must report this to Lord Kabeiris."},{"lineNumber":254192,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィは働かない、ホーネットを殺してしまえと","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky is useless; kill Hornet."},{"lineNumber":254193,"originalJapaneseLine":"すみません、明日はもっとがんばります。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m sorry, I’ll do better tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":254194,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふん、まぁいいだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, very well then."},{"lineNumber":254195,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、今夜の仕事だ、お前のおかげで仲間達が殺された兵士達がうっぷんを募らせている","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, tonight’s task: because of you, the soldiers whose comrades were killed are growing furious."},{"lineNumber":254196,"originalJapaneseLine":"その身を捧げて彼らの怒りを受け止めてやるがいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Offer yourself and bear their rage."},{"lineNumber":254197,"originalJapaneseLine":"イベントシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Event scene."},{"lineNumber":254198,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィが魔物に陵辱されるシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Scene of Silky being violated by monsters."},{"lineNumber":254199,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝、戦場　１軍司令部から少し離れた場所、前線","translatedEnglishLine":"Morning, battlefield—frontline, a place a little away from the 1st army command post."},{"lineNumber":254200,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し離れた所に魔軍の陣地がある、戦場の空気","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army’s position lies a bit further away, the atmosphere of the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254201,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝ご飯を食べて、作戦会議","translatedEnglishLine":"Having breakfast, then a strategy meeting."},{"lineNumber":254202,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィはこの戦場に来ている、また複数の魔物将軍、そして","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Silky is present on this battlefield, along with multiple monster generals, and"},{"lineNumber":254203,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ヨシフも展開している。","translatedEnglishLine":"the monster General Yosif is also deployed."},{"lineNumber":254204,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨日は後退しながらの戦いでなんとか不正だが今日も本気でやらねばな","translatedEnglishLine":"Yesterday was a retreating fight, barely a stalemate, but today we have to go all out again."},{"lineNumber":254205,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここを突破されるとリーザス城まで侵攻されてしまうからな","translatedEnglishLine":"If they break through here, they’ll invade all the way to Lizas Castle."},{"lineNumber":254206,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス殿はどうされます。","translatedEnglishLine":"What will you do, Lord Lance?"},{"lineNumber":254207,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィはしばらく立つと前線に現るはずですが、魔物大将軍ヨシフは","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Silky should appear at the frontline after a while, but the monster General Yosif"},{"lineNumber":254208,"originalJapaneseLine":"後方から動かないと思うのでなかなか近寄る事は難しいかと","translatedEnglishLine":"I think he won’t move from the rear, so it will be difficult to get close."},{"lineNumber":254209,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様の目的はシルキィちゃんだ。シルキィが出てくるまではしばし待機させてもらうぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"My goal is Silky-chan. Until she comes out, I’ll remain on standby."},{"lineNumber":254210,"originalJapaneseLine":"部下の報告、前線で小競り合いが始まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Report from subordinates: a skirmish has started at the frontline."},{"lineNumber":254211,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"Battlefield."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵はすでに何度か戦っているが勝てない事は分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lizas soldiers have fought several times already, but they know they cannot win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐えて耐えて、ある程度時間を稼いだら撤収するか、次の部隊にチェンジする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They endure and endure, and once they buy some time, they either retreat or switch to the next unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィに鉄の網をかぶせて時間稼ぎ、落とし穴とかの罠、とにかく時間稼ぎが主
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Covering Silky with an iron net to buy time, with traps like pits—anyway, the main goal is to stall for time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、コルドバの指揮の下、魔人を無闇に恐れずに有効に対処しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under the command of Bares and Cordoba, they are effectively dealing with the demon without unreasonable fear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィが強い感じは見せて下さい、勝てない暴走機関車、恐ろしい存在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show that the demon Silky feels strong—a runaway locomotive that cannot be defeated, a terrifying existence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦線は後退し魔軍がどんどんリーザス城方面へ迫ってきた、地図で見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The frontline has retreated and the demon army is steadily advancing toward Lizas Castle; show this on the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、頃合いだな。砲兵部隊に連絡しろ、出番だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares, the time is right. Contact the artillery unit; it's their turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方、砲兵部隊、チューリップ２号マレスケと香澄。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rear, artillery unit: Tulip No. 2 Malesuke and Kasumi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの指示を受けて砲撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving Bares' orders, they begin shelling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再び前線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back to the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの戦略的な誘導により突出してきた魔軍、魔人シルキィが集中している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, pushed forward by Bares' strategic guidance, is concentrated around the demon Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにピンポイントで砲撃が降り注いだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pinpoint artillery fire rained down there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍側の被害は甚大
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army suffered severe damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスを賞賛する部下達、やりましたね将軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Subordinates praise Bares: "Well done, General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かに大きな被害は与えたが、戦力差がありすぎ、一時しのぎに過ぎない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, we've inflicted major damage, but the difference in strength is too great; it’s just a temporary reprieve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵が混乱しているからといって深追いしてはいけない、こちらも撤収するぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though the enemy is confused, we must not pursue recklessly; we will also withdraw.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後、砲兵部隊は今夜中に陣地を撤収させろ、砲は放棄してよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, the artillery unit must withdraw their positions by tonight. The cannons may be abandoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、あれはカスタムから借り受けた貴重な兵器ですよ、放棄なんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But those are valuable weapons borrowed from Custom. Abandoning them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵もあの威力は十分に知っただろう、明日の朝には攻めてくるぞ、いや下手したら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy now fully knows their power. They'll attack by tomorrow morning, or worse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜中にも来るかもしれない、あの砲台は簡単には動かせないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They might come even tonight. That cannon emplacement can’t be moved easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 接近戦になると守りきれないからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it becomes close combat, we won’t be able to defend it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砲は失ってもカスタムから借り受けている砲兵のみなさんは待避させねばならない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we lose the cannons, the artillery soldiers borrowed from Custom must be evacuated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じの話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the kind of conversation it was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷静な判断をしている雰囲気で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With an atmosphere of calm judgment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１軍の陣地にランスが到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance arrived at the 1st army's position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスが出迎えてくれる、バレスとランスのそれっぽい会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares welcomed him; Bares and Lance have a fitting conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達を護衛してきたハウレーン、バレスとぎこちない会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howleen, who has been escorting Lance and his group, has an awkward conversation with Bares.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親に逆らって騎士になった娘、嫁にも行き遅れた、まったく（だが少し誇らしい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A daughter who defied her parents to become a knight, and has become late for marriage—really (but somewhat proud).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫁入り前に傷ものになってはどうする、いや、任務だから自ら傷付こうとランス達を守れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What if she gets damaged before marriage? No, since it’s a mission, she’ll willingly get hurt to protect Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とかいいつつ、ランス殿よろしく頼みますと親ばかっぷりも出すとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying things like that, yet showing a doting parent’s side by asking ‘Please take care of Lance, sir.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンはランスに犯された事を父には当然言えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howleen, of course, cannot tell her father that Lance violated her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍、その夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, that night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦い疲れて戻って来たシルキィ、チューリップの砲撃直撃も受けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, exhausted from battle, returned—she was also hit directly by Tulip's shelling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフもいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster General Yosif is also present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （シルキィは最初は鎧、そして鎧解除する）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Silky initially wears armor, then removes it.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネチネチとシルキィを言葉で嬲ります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They verbally torment Silky in a nagging manner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間に手加減をしたな、勝てなかったばかりか魔軍に多数の被害が出た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You showed mercy to the humans, didn’t you? Not only did you fail to win, but you also caused many losses to the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様が殺したのも同じだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the same as what you killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元人間の英雄だったから、我々ではなく人間の味方を優先したのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you were once a human hero, you prioritized humans over us?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏切り者か、それなら・・ケイブリス様に報告しないといけないな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A traitor, then... If so, we must report this to Lord Kabeiris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは働かない、ホーネットを殺してしまえと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is useless; kill Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみません、明日はもっとがんばります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m sorry, I’ll do better tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、まぁいいだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, very well then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、今夜の仕事だ、お前のおかげで仲間達が殺された兵士達がうっぷんを募らせている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, tonight’s task: because of you, the soldiers whose comrades were killed are growing furious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その身を捧げて彼らの怒りを受け止めてやるがいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Offer yourself and bear their rage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イベントシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Event scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィが魔物に陵辱されるシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene of Silky being violated by monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝、戦場　１軍司令部から少し離れた場所、前線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning, battlefield—frontline, a place a little away from the 1st army command post.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し離れた所に魔軍の陣地がある、戦場の空気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army’s position lies a bit further away, the atmosphere of the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝ご飯を食べて、作戦会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having breakfast, then a strategy meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィはこの戦場に来ている、また複数の魔物将軍、そして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Silky is present on this battlefield, along with multiple monster generals, and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフも展開している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the monster General Yosif is also deployed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日は後退しながらの戦いでなんとか不正だが今日も本気でやらねばな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yesterday was a retreating fight, barely a stalemate, but today we have to go all out again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを突破されるとリーザス城まで侵攻されてしまうからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they break through here, they’ll invade all the way to Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿はどうされます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do, Lord Lance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィはしばらく立つと前線に現るはずですが、魔物大将軍ヨシフは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Silky should appear at the frontline after a while, but the monster General Yosif

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方から動かないと思うのでなかなか近寄る事は難しいかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think he won’t move from the rear, so it will be difficult to get close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の目的はシルキィちゃんだ。シルキィが出てくるまではしばし待機させてもらうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My goal is Silky-chan. Until she comes out, I’ll remain on standby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下の報告、前線で小競り合いが始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report from subordinates: a skirmish has started at the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battlefield.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":254152,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス兵はすでに何度か戦っているが勝てない事は分かっている","translatedEnglishLine":"The Lizas soldiers have fought several times already, but they know they cannot win."},{"lineNumber":254153,"originalJapaneseLine":"耐えて耐えて、ある程度時間を稼いだら撤収するか、次の部隊にチェンジする","translatedEnglishLine":"They endure and endure, and once they buy some time, they either retreat or switch to the next unit."},{"lineNumber":254154,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィに鉄の網をかぶせて時間稼ぎ、落とし穴とかの罠、とにかく時間稼ぎが主","translatedEnglishLine":"Covering Silky with an iron net to buy time, with traps like pits—anyway, the main goal is to stall for time."},{"lineNumber":254155,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス、コルドバの指揮の下、魔人を無闇に恐れずに有効に対処しています","translatedEnglishLine":"Under the command of Bares and Cordoba, they are effectively dealing with the demon without unreasonable fear."},{"lineNumber":254156,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィが強い感じは見せて下さい、勝てない暴走機関車、恐ろしい存在","translatedEnglishLine":"Show that the demon Silky feels strong—a runaway locomotive that cannot be defeated, a terrifying existence."},{"lineNumber":254157,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦線は後退し魔軍がどんどんリーザス城方面へ迫ってきた、地図で見せる","translatedEnglishLine":"The frontline has retreated and the demon army is steadily advancing toward Lizas Castle; show this on the map."},{"lineNumber":254158,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレス、頃合いだな。砲兵部隊に連絡しろ、出番だと","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares, the time is right. Contact the artillery unit; it's their turn."},{"lineNumber":254159,"originalJapaneseLine":"後方、砲兵部隊、チューリップ２号マレスケと香澄。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rear, artillery unit: Tulip No. 2 Malesuke and Kasumi."},{"lineNumber":254160,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの指示を受けて砲撃開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Receiving Bares' orders, they begin shelling."},{"lineNumber":254161,"originalJapaneseLine":"再び前線","translatedEnglishLine":"Back to the frontline."},{"lineNumber":254162,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスの戦略的な誘導により突出してきた魔軍、魔人シルキィが集中している","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army, pushed forward by Bares' strategic guidance, is concentrated around the demon Silky."},{"lineNumber":254163,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこにピンポイントで砲撃が降り注いだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Pinpoint artillery fire rained down there."},{"lineNumber":254164,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍側の被害は甚大","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army suffered severe damage."},{"lineNumber":254165,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスを賞賛する部下達、やりましたね将軍","translatedEnglishLine":"Subordinates praise Bares: \"Well done, General.\""},{"lineNumber":254166,"originalJapaneseLine":"確かに大きな被害は与えたが、戦力差がありすぎ、一時しのぎに過ぎない","translatedEnglishLine":"Indeed, we've inflicted major damage, but the difference in strength is too great; it’s just a temporary reprieve."},{"lineNumber":254167,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵が混乱しているからといって深追いしてはいけない、こちらも撤収するぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though the enemy is confused, we must not pursue recklessly; we will also withdraw."},{"lineNumber":254168,"originalJapaneseLine":"後、砲兵部隊は今夜中に陣地を撤収させろ、砲は放棄してよい","translatedEnglishLine":"Furthermore, the artillery unit must withdraw their positions by tonight. The cannons may be abandoned."},{"lineNumber":254169,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、あれはカスタムから借り受けた貴重な兵器ですよ、放棄なんて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"But those are valuable weapons borrowed from Custom. Abandoning them..."},{"lineNumber":254170,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵もあの威力は十分に知っただろう、明日の朝には攻めてくるぞ、いや下手したら","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy now fully knows their power. They'll attack by tomorrow morning, or worse,"},{"lineNumber":254171,"originalJapaneseLine":"今夜中にも来るかもしれない、あの砲台は簡単には動かせないし","translatedEnglishLine":"They might come even tonight. That cannon emplacement can’t be moved easily."},{"lineNumber":254172,"originalJapaneseLine":"接近戦になると守りきれないからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"If it becomes close combat, we won’t be able to defend it."},{"lineNumber":254173,"originalJapaneseLine":"砲は失ってもカスタムから借り受けている砲兵のみなさんは待避させねばならない","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if we lose the cannons, the artillery soldiers borrowed from Custom must be evacuated."},{"lineNumber":254174,"originalJapaneseLine":"てな感じの話・・","translatedEnglishLine":"That’s the kind of conversation it was..."},{"lineNumber":254175,"originalJapaneseLine":"冷静な判断をしている雰囲気で","translatedEnglishLine":"With an atmosphere of calm judgment."},{"lineNumber":254176,"originalJapaneseLine":"第１軍の陣地にランスが到着した。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance arrived at the 1st army's position."},{"lineNumber":254177,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスが出迎えてくれる、バレスとランスのそれっぽい会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Bares welcomed him; Bares and Lance have a fitting conversation."},{"lineNumber":254178,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達を護衛してきたハウレーン、バレスとぎこちない会話","translatedEnglishLine":"Howleen, who has been escorting Lance and his group, has an awkward conversation with Bares."},{"lineNumber":254179,"originalJapaneseLine":"親に逆らって騎士になった娘、嫁にも行き遅れた、まったく（だが少し誇らしい）","translatedEnglishLine":"A daughter who defied her parents to become a knight, and has become late for marriage—really (but somewhat proud)."},{"lineNumber":254180,"originalJapaneseLine":"嫁入り前に傷ものになってはどうする、いや、任務だから自ら傷付こうとランス達を守れ","translatedEnglishLine":"What if she gets damaged before marriage? No, since it’s a mission, she’ll willingly get hurt to protect Lance and the others."},{"lineNumber":254181,"originalJapaneseLine":"とかいいつつ、ランス殿よろしく頼みますと親ばかっぷりも出すとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Saying things like that, yet showing a doting parent’s side by asking ‘Please take care of Lance, sir.’"},{"lineNumber":254182,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハウレーンはランスに犯された事を父には当然言えない","translatedEnglishLine":"Howleen, of course, cannot tell her father that Lance violated her."},{"lineNumber":254183,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍、その夜","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army, that night."},{"lineNumber":254184,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦い疲れて戻って来たシルキィ、チューリップの砲撃直撃も受けた","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky, exhausted from battle, returned—she was also hit directly by Tulip's shelling."},{"lineNumber":254185,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ヨシフもいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster General Yosif is also present."},{"lineNumber":254186,"originalJapaneseLine":"（シルキィは最初は鎧、そして鎧解除する）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Silky initially wears armor, then removes it.)"},{"lineNumber":254187,"originalJapaneseLine":"ネチネチとシルキィを言葉で嬲ります。","translatedEnglishLine":"They verbally torment Silky in a nagging manner."},{"lineNumber":254188,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間に手加減をしたな、勝てなかったばかりか魔軍に多数の被害が出た","translatedEnglishLine":"You showed mercy to the humans, didn’t you? Not only did you fail to win, but you also caused many losses to the demon army."},{"lineNumber":254189,"originalJapaneseLine":"貴様が殺したのも同じだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"It's the same as what you killed."},{"lineNumber":254190,"originalJapaneseLine":"元人間の英雄だったから、我々ではなく人間の味方を優先したのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Because you were once a human hero, you prioritized humans over us?"},{"lineNumber":254191,"originalJapaneseLine":"裏切り者か、それなら・・ケイブリス様に報告しないといけないな","translatedEnglishLine":"A traitor, then... If so, we must report this to Lord Kabeiris."},{"lineNumber":254192,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィは働かない、ホーネットを殺してしまえと","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky is useless; kill Hornet."},{"lineNumber":254193,"originalJapaneseLine":"すみません、明日はもっとがんばります。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m sorry, I’ll do better tomorrow."},{"lineNumber":254194,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふん、まぁいいだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmph, very well then."},{"lineNumber":254195,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、今夜の仕事だ、お前のおかげで仲間達が殺された兵士達がうっぷんを募らせている","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, tonight’s task: because of you, the soldiers whose comrades were killed are growing furious."},{"lineNumber":254196,"originalJapaneseLine":"その身を捧げて彼らの怒りを受け止めてやるがいい","translatedEnglishLine":"Offer yourself and bear their rage."},{"lineNumber":254197,"originalJapaneseLine":"イベントシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Event scene."},{"lineNumber":254198,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィが魔物に陵辱されるシーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Scene of Silky being violated by monsters."},{"lineNumber":254199,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝、戦場　１軍司令部から少し離れた場所、前線","translatedEnglishLine":"Morning, battlefield—frontline, a place a little away from the 1st army command post."},{"lineNumber":254200,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し離れた所に魔軍の陣地がある、戦場の空気","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army’s position lies a bit further away, the atmosphere of the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254201,"originalJapaneseLine":"朝ご飯を食べて、作戦会議","translatedEnglishLine":"Having breakfast, then a strategy meeting."},{"lineNumber":254202,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィはこの戦場に来ている、また複数の魔物将軍、そして","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Silky is present on this battlefield, along with multiple monster generals, and"},{"lineNumber":254203,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ヨシフも展開している。","translatedEnglishLine":"the monster General Yosif is also deployed."},{"lineNumber":254204,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨日は後退しながらの戦いでなんとか不正だが今日も本気でやらねばな","translatedEnglishLine":"Yesterday was a retreating fight, barely a stalemate, but today we have to go all out again."},{"lineNumber":254205,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここを突破されるとリーザス城まで侵攻されてしまうからな","translatedEnglishLine":"If they break through here, they’ll invade all the way to Lizas Castle."},{"lineNumber":254206,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス殿はどうされます。","translatedEnglishLine":"What will you do, Lord Lance?"},{"lineNumber":254207,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人シルキィはしばらく立つと前線に現るはずですが、魔物大将軍ヨシフは","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Silky should appear at the frontline after a while, but the monster General Yosif"},{"lineNumber":254208,"originalJapaneseLine":"後方から動かないと思うのでなかなか近寄る事は難しいかと","translatedEnglishLine":"I think he won’t move from the rear, so it will be difficult to get close."},{"lineNumber":254209,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺様の目的はシルキィちゃんだ。シルキィが出てくるまではしばし待機させてもらうぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"My goal is Silky-chan. Until she comes out, I’ll remain on standby."},{"lineNumber":254210,"originalJapaneseLine":"部下の報告、前線で小競り合いが始まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Report from subordinates: a skirmish has started at the frontline."},{"lineNumber":254211,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場","translatedEnglishLine":"Battlefield."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス兵はすでに何度か戦っているが勝てない事は分かっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lizas soldiers have fought several times already, but they know they cannot win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 耐えて耐えて、ある程度時間を稼いだら撤収するか、次の部隊にチェンジする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They endure and endure, and once they buy some time, they either retreat or switch to the next unit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィに鉄の網をかぶせて時間稼ぎ、落とし穴とかの罠、とにかく時間稼ぎが主
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Covering Silky with an iron net to buy time, with traps like pits—anyway, the main goal is to stall for time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、コルドバの指揮の下、魔人を無闇に恐れずに有効に対処しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Under the command of Bares and Cordoba, they are effectively dealing with the demon without unreasonable fear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィが強い感じは見せて下さい、勝てない暴走機関車、恐ろしい存在
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Show that the demon Silky feels strong—a runaway locomotive that cannot be defeated, a terrifying existence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦線は後退し魔軍がどんどんリーザス城方面へ迫ってきた、地図で見せる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The frontline has retreated and the demon army is steadily advancing toward Lizas Castle; show this on the map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレス、頃合いだな。砲兵部隊に連絡しろ、出番だと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares, the time is right. Contact the artillery unit; it's their turn.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方、砲兵部隊、チューリップ２号マレスケと香澄。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rear, artillery unit: Tulip No. 2 Malesuke and Kasumi.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの指示を受けて砲撃開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Receiving Bares' orders, they begin shelling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 再び前線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Back to the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスの戦略的な誘導により突出してきた魔軍、魔人シルキィが集中している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, pushed forward by Bares' strategic guidance, is concentrated around the demon Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにピンポイントで砲撃が降り注いだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pinpoint artillery fire rained down there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍側の被害は甚大
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army suffered severe damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスを賞賛する部下達、やりましたね将軍
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Subordinates praise Bares: "Well done, General."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確かに大きな被害は与えたが、戦力差がありすぎ、一時しのぎに過ぎない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Indeed, we've inflicted major damage, but the difference in strength is too great; it’s just a temporary reprieve.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵が混乱しているからといって深追いしてはいけない、こちらも撤収するぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though the enemy is confused, we must not pursue recklessly; we will also withdraw.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後、砲兵部隊は今夜中に陣地を撤収させろ、砲は放棄してよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Furthermore, the artillery unit must withdraw their positions by tonight. The cannons may be abandoned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、あれはカスタムから借り受けた貴重な兵器ですよ、放棄なんて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But those are valuable weapons borrowed from Custom. Abandoning them...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵もあの威力は十分に知っただろう、明日の朝には攻めてくるぞ、いや下手したら
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy now fully knows their power. They'll attack by tomorrow morning, or worse,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今夜中にも来るかもしれない、あの砲台は簡単には動かせないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They might come even tonight. That cannon emplacement can’t be moved easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 接近戦になると守りきれないからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it becomes close combat, we won’t be able to defend it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砲は失ってもカスタムから借り受けている砲兵のみなさんは待避させねばならない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if we lose the cannons, the artillery soldiers borrowed from Custom must be evacuated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じの話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s the kind of conversation it was...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 冷静な判断をしている雰囲気で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With an atmosphere of calm judgment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１軍の陣地にランスが到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance arrived at the 1st army's position.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスが出迎えてくれる、バレスとランスのそれっぽい会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bares welcomed him; Bares and Lance have a fitting conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達を護衛してきたハウレーン、バレスとぎこちない会話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howleen, who has been escorting Lance and his group, has an awkward conversation with Bares.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親に逆らって騎士になった娘、嫁にも行き遅れた、まったく（だが少し誇らしい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A daughter who defied her parents to become a knight, and has become late for marriage—really (but somewhat proud).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 嫁入り前に傷ものになってはどうする、いや、任務だから自ら傷付こうとランス達を守れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What if she gets damaged before marriage? No, since it’s a mission, she’ll willingly get hurt to protect Lance and the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とかいいつつ、ランス殿よろしく頼みますと親ばかっぷりも出すとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Saying things like that, yet showing a doting parent’s side by asking ‘Please take care of Lance, sir.’

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハウレーンはランスに犯された事を父には当然言えない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Howleen, of course, cannot tell her father that Lance violated her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍、その夜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army, that night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦い疲れて戻って来たシルキィ、チューリップの砲撃直撃も受けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky, exhausted from battle, returned—she was also hit directly by Tulip's shelling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフもいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster General Yosif is also present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （シルキィは最初は鎧、そして鎧解除する）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Silky initially wears armor, then removes it.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ネチネチとシルキィを言葉で嬲ります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They verbally torment Silky in a nagging manner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間に手加減をしたな、勝てなかったばかりか魔軍に多数の被害が出た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You showed mercy to the humans, didn’t you? Not only did you fail to win, but you also caused many losses to the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様が殺したのも同じだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the same as what you killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元人間の英雄だったから、我々ではなく人間の味方を優先したのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because you were once a human hero, you prioritized humans over us?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 裏切り者か、それなら・・ケイブリス様に報告しないといけないな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A traitor, then... If so, we must report this to Lord Kabeiris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは働かない、ホーネットを殺してしまえと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is useless; kill Hornet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すみません、明日はもっとがんばります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m sorry, I’ll do better tomorrow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふん、まぁいいだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, very well then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、今夜の仕事だ、お前のおかげで仲間達が殺された兵士達がうっぷんを募らせている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, tonight’s task: because of you, the soldiers whose comrades were killed are growing furious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その身を捧げて彼らの怒りを受け止めてやるがいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Offer yourself and bear their rage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: イベントシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Event scene.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィが魔物に陵辱されるシーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene of Silky being violated by monsters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝、戦場　１軍司令部から少し離れた場所、前線
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Morning, battlefield—frontline, a place a little away from the 1st army command post.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し離れた所に魔軍の陣地がある、戦場の空気
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army’s position lies a bit further away, the atmosphere of the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝ご飯を食べて、作戦会議
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having breakfast, then a strategy meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィはこの戦場に来ている、また複数の魔物将軍、そして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Silky is present on this battlefield, along with multiple monster generals, and

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ヨシフも展開している。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the monster General Yosif is also deployed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨日は後退しながらの戦いでなんとか不正だが今日も本気でやらねばな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yesterday was a retreating fight, barely a stalemate, but today we have to go all out again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを突破されるとリーザス城まで侵攻されてしまうからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they break through here, they’ll invade all the way to Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス殿はどうされます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What will you do, Lord Lance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人シルキィはしばらく立つと前線に現るはずですが、魔物大将軍ヨシフは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Silky should appear at the frontline after a while, but the monster General Yosif

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後方から動かないと思うのでなかなか近寄る事は難しいかと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think he won’t move from the rear, so it will be difficult to get close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の目的はシルキィちゃんだ。シルキィが出てくるまではしばし待機させてもらうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: My goal is Silky-chan. Until she comes out, I’ll remain on standby.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 部下の報告、前線で小競り合いが始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report from subordinates: a skirmish has started at the frontline.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battlefield.
